data.title: Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit
data.meta_description: Located in Auburn Hills. Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit hotel offers suites with full kitchens, free breakfast, an outdoor pool, and modern amenities.
data.text:
Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit has a surprisingly different take on the extended-stay experience. Our hotel offers a relaxing place to unwind and be yourself thanks to our design, comfy beds, and a staff that simply wants to make you feel at home.

Our one and two bedroom suites are ideal for business travelers and family vacationers alike with all the amenities you’d find in a small apartment. We offer laundry facilities, onsite parking, and free WiFi for long term guests. Whether you’re here for business or pleasure, we offer you more ways to enjoy your stay.

We strive to make your stay as comfortable as possible and to accommodate the needs of our guests with disabilities. Please contact the hotel if you have any special requests relating to your disability.

The following areas are accessible:

Public entrance

Route from the hotel’s public entrance to

The registration area

The accessible guest rooms

The restaurants

The meeting room/ballroom area

The fitness center

The swimming pool

The business center

Registration desk

Public restrooms

Restaurant

Accessible parking spaces for cars in self-parking facility

Fitness center

Swimming pool

Business center

Additional accessibility information:

Hotel has a TTY for guest use

Guest room TVs have closed captioning or closed caption decoders provided

Service animals are welcome

Braille and tactile signage is provided for permanent rooms and spaces

Hotel employees will read menus and other printed/visual information and provide verbal directions to locations in the hotel to guests who are blind/low vision

Audio/visual fire alarms in common areas

Information About Accessible Guest Suites

Our hotel has the following accessible suite types:

Hearing Accessible Studio King

Hearing Accessible One-Bedroom King

Hearing Accessible Two-Bedroom King, 2 Kings

Mobility Accessible Studio King, Tub

Mobility Accessible Studio King, Roll-in Shower

Mobility Accessible One-Bedroom, King, Tub

Mobility Accessible One-Bedroom, 2 Queens, Tub

Mobility Accessible Two-Bedroom, 2 Kings, Tub

Mobility Accessible Two-Bedroom, 1 King, 2 Queens, Roll-in Shower

Suites designated as mobility accessible have features for guests with mobility disabilities, including, but not limited to:

Doorways that provide 32” of clear width

Roll-in shower or tub with grab bars (specific bathing fixture type is indicated for each room in the room name)

Lowered light switches and thermostats

Toilets with grab bars

Accessible vanity

Accessible route to all parts of the room

Suites designated as hearing accessible have features for guests who are deaf or hard of hearing, including visual alarms and notification devices.

For general amenities associated with each suite type, please see our suites page.

Please call us at 1.248.322.4600 should you have further questions about accessibility or email us at reservations@sonesta.com.

We love your furry friends as much as you do.

Sonesta is proud to invite your cuddly companions and provide special amenities like bowls, waterproof mats, and treats at check-in. We’ll greet your pet with an arrival letter outlining our local recommendations for a pawsome stay.

Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit is pet-friendly and welcomes well-mannered pets, with no breed or weight restrictions. Up to two pets are permitted per suite.

$75 fee applies for stays up to 7 nights; $150 for all longer stays.

Learn more about our pet policy here.

With everything from free breakfast and high-speed WiFi to our fitness center, you'll have everything you need for a convenient and comfortable stay in Auburn Hills. If you need anything else during your stay, feel free to ask our friendly front desk staff.

The Mat

Grab a workout at the mat, our new fitness facility.

The Nest

Hang out in the nest, a new twist on the family living room where you can socialize or simply relax.

The Dip

Enjoy a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool, open seasonally.

The Dish

Feel more at home at ES Suites with free breakfast including fresh coffee and a variety of breakfast offerings.

The Pour

Mingle with co-workers or friends over a tasty beverage at the pour.

The Soap

Enjoy a clean getaway with our convenient, on-site laundry facilities.

Breakfast Reimagined​

We’re excited to offer an expanded set of tasty choices for our free breakfast, with sweet, savory, and satisfying options to energize your adventures. ​

AWAKE: Take the first sip of the day here with a selection of coffees, teas, hot chocolate, and juices to go. ​

GRAINS: Choose from popular Kellogg’s® cereals, oatmeal, or granola, topped off with yogurt, dried fruit, and more. ​

GRIDDLE: Make your own fluffy creation with our fun interactive pancake maker. Finish with extras like chocolate chips, sprinkles, fruit compote, or syrup.

BAKED: Enjoy breakfast staples like toast, English muffins, bagels, and blueberry muffins with all your favorite spreads. ​

CRACKED: Create a custom breakfast taco, burrito, or bowl, or opt for a classic American breakfast. Hot sauces for every palate create the finishing touch.

The Shoppe

Open 24 hours a day, right next to the front desk, the shoppe is a convenient spot to grab a variety of snacks, candies, beverages, ice cream, frozen foods, essential toiletries, and more.

Local Restaurants for Eat-In, Take-Out or Delivery

Count on the Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit to point you in the right direction for dinner. In your suite, you’ll find a full list of local restaurants that offer take-out, delivery or full table service. Many are even within walking distance. If you need a personal recommendation, our knowledgeable staff is eager to help.

Enjoy a Cup of Coffee, Smoothies and More

Stop by the pour for a specialty coffee or signature smoothie to give you that pick me up you need throughout the day.

Barbecue Grills in the Yard

Prepare a quick meal on our outdoor grills, free for your use.

At Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit, we help you get down to business. Spread out in our oversized suites and be productive. Prepare your own meals in your fully equipped kitchen. Take advantage of same day dry cleaning. Revitalize in the outdoor pool. And stay plugged in with free WiFi throughout the hotel and our onsite 24 hour business center with copy, faxing, and printing capabilities.

For all deposits and final payments, we are pleased to accept all major credit cards including American Express.

At Sonesta ES Suites Auburn Hills Detroit, we go above and beyond to welcome sports groups of all ages and types. Our Auburn Hills location and sports-friendly amenities make us a favorite among sports group travel.

We are proud to uphold our Sports Certified status through the Sonesta International Hotels Corporation family of hotels. This certification means that our hotel has undergone industry specific training and has demonstrated the ability to successfully accommodate sports groups.

We offer special sports group amenities that focus on creating convenience and value for your team, so you can concentrate on the game.

Breakfast included in rate

Parking included in rate

Complimentary Wi-Fi

Complimentary meeting space (if available on site)

Contact our Sales office at 248.322.4600 to book a group room block for your team or book your own room here.

Looking to book multiple rooms or planning a longer stay?

Our hotel is ideal for those relocating for work, attending a multi-week training, or enjoying a family vacation where you may need multiple guest rooms to accommodate your stay.

Whether booking more rooms for yourself or for others as well, our hotel offers the comfort, convenience, and delightful extras to keep everyone happy. Plus, the longer you stay, the less you'll pay. Our generous amenities make your stay more enjoyable:

• Free hot breakfast, daily

• 24/7 fitness centers

• Apartment-style living

• Full kitchens

Reserve up to three guest rooms online by clicking here and booking directly through our website.

If you wish to reserve four or more Guest Rooms, please call 1-800-Sonesta.

Your home away from home is waiting for you!
